attributes.action: losing your spleen (immune system) should be classed as a disability
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i lost my immune system when i was 11, i'm now 27 and i find it difficult to find a job, due to health issues, may 05 i was sacked by the hfax due to having 36 days off dueto illness, stress, and having no immune system has played well in making sure i don't ge jobs or keep jobs, so a change in the law is justified, also i applied for the army, and they discriminate by saying if you have lost your spleen you can't apply, why is this? change the law class having no immune system as a disability.
